;

;As of November 28, 2023, NIO has built 2,184 power swap stations around the world. Visual China/Photo

;

;Following Changan Automobile (000625.SZ), NIO (09866.HK, NYSE:NIO) has made another success with its battery swap.

;

;On November 29, 2023, Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Geely Holding) and NIO officially signed a strategic cooperation agreement on battery swapping in Hangzhou. The two parties will work on battery swapping standards and battery swapping technology. , carry out comprehensive cooperation in various fields such as battery swap service network construction and operation, battery swap model R&D and customization, battery asset management and operation.

;

;According to the agreement, in the future, the two parties will create two major battery swap standard systems for "private cars" and "commercial vehicles" through the "co-investment, co-construction, sharing, and co-operation" model to promote vehicle-end , station end, battery end, and operation end are connected and coordinated to expand the scale of the battery swap network to meet users with different needs.

;

;On November 20, NIO founder Li Bin revealed in an internal speech to all employees that in addition to Changan Automobile, there are 4-5 potential partners currently being negotiated. In other words, more car companies may join NIO's "circle of friends" for battery swapping.

;

;Li Yanwei, the expert committee of the China Automobile Dealers Association, told Southern Weekend reporters that the expansion of the "circle of friends" for battery swapping has a strategic significance higher than the practical level, and it will have a limited effect on improving their respective revenue in the short term.

;

;In his view, the initial cooperation between the parties is exploratory and may start with operating vehicles such as online ride-hailing. "If the results are good, it may be upgraded to more important models or high-value models." ".

;

;There are only two roads in front of you

;

;Recently, a piece of news "NIO lost 76.4 billion in five and a half years" appeared on Weibo's hot search.

;

;From 2018 to 2022, NIO’s net profits attributable to the parent company were -23.328 billion yuan, -11.413 billion yuan, -5.611 billion yuan, -10.572 billion yuan and -14.559 billion yuan respectively. In the first half of 2023, NIO's net profit attributable to its parent company continued to suffer a loss of 10.926 billion yuan, with a cumulative loss of 76.4 billion yuan in 5.5 years.

;

;Although at the recent Guangzhou Automobile Industry Development Conference, NIO co-founder and president Qin Lihong emphasized that "NIO will never go bankrupt, and it is impossible for it to go bankrupt." But it is undeniable that Weilai has invested too much in “peripheral products” and its sales have declined.

;

;Previously, Li Bin’s internal speech to all employees was also on the hot search. He said that the road to battery replacement is very difficult, but it is difficult and the right thing to do. "Everyone thinks of battery replacement as Amazon doing cloud services in 2003, as well as Alibaba, Tencent, Microsoft, etc. They have suffered losses for many years. Only then did we finally achieve success.”

;

;NIO and NIO’s battery swap are always accompanied by controversy. The construction of a service system with power exchange as the core is regarded as the main reason for NIO's losses.

;

;According to the plan, NIO will deploy a total of 2,300 power swap stations in 2023. As of November 28, NIO has built 2,184 power stations around the world.

;

;Although the cost of each generation of NIO's three generations of power swap stations is slightly different, if based on a rough calculation of the 3 million yuan cost of each power swap station stated by Qin Lihong at the 2023 Shanghai Auto Show, NIO's power swap performance will be The cumulative investment has exceeded 6.5 billion yuan. This does not include additional expenses such as venue rental, personnel operations and electricity expenses. Based on NIO’s goal of adding 1,000 battery swap stations in 2023, the cost of building the stations alone will be as high as 3 billion yuan.

;

;Shen Fei, NIO’s vice president in charge of NIO Power, revealed at a press conference in March that the battery swap station had to serve 50-60 orders per day to achieve breakeven. At that time, NIO’s battery swap station averaged 35 orders per day. -36 orders. The implication is that Weilai is still in the loss-making stage when it comes to battery replacement.

;

;Li Yanwei believes that NIO positions itself as a luxury brand and provides services such as battery replacement and user rights to make up for the lack of product and brand power. It has indeed played a very good role in brand building in the early stage. However, as investment increased, its sales volume did not increase significantly, but instead became a huge burden. "Keeping it has limited use, just throw it away. It's a pity."

;

;There are only two ways in front of Weilai, either to sell more cars and dilute the power exchange network construction from within. or introduce more car companies to participate in NIO’s power swap network to create a scale effect and alleviate financial difficulties.

;

;In fact, Weilai has already had clues about opening up the battery swap business. At the China Electric Vehicles 100 People Forum held in April 2023, Li Bin said that "the battery swap service has reached the stage where it can be exported to the outside world." He hoped that other companies can share and build charging and swap infrastructure with NIO, and revealed that there are already Car companies are discussing this matter with NIO.

;

;Fu Yuwu, honorary chairman of the Society of Automotive Engineers of China, told Southern Weekend reporters that as the current battery swap model has not yet found a profit model, there are only more battery swap stations and a more convenient energy replenishment experience. Only then can more users be willing to buy battery-exchange models, thus forming a positive cycle. NIO's cooperation with Geely, Changan and other automobile manufacturers will help promote the battery swap model on a larger scale, improve the overall operating efficiency of the battery swap model, and may solve the commercialization problem of battery swap.

;

;Or start from online car-hailing services

;

;The battery swap model laid out by NIO does have many advantages. For example, it only takes less than 5 minutes for car owners to replace the battery at the battery swap station. However, the disadvantage is that the battery swap model still faces problems such as high website construction costs, uncertain commercialization models, and inconsistent industry standards.

;

;At present, there are several companies on the market that are trying to lay out the power swap model, but the construction of power swap stations is independent of each other. Since 2020, relevant national departments have continued to promote the formulation of standards for battery swap stations and battery packs.

;

;At the 2023 World Power Battery Conference, Xin Guobin, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, revealed an important signal. Currently, a battery replacement technology standard system is being studied and compiled to promote battery replacement battery size, battery replacement interface, Standards such as communication protocols are unified. At the same time, relevant departments have also entered into the inspection process for the national battery replacement station standards.

;

;Fu Yuwu believes that each car company has different models and batteries. In the context of cooperation, battery swapping may require a transition period to improve the versatility of the battery swapping network. "However, it can force companies to make better efforts in standardization, which is of key significance to the structural adjustment of the battery swap model."

;

;However, some people question that unified battery swap operation management may affect Wei Come to the battery swapping experience of existing users.

;

;Unlike NIO’s battery swap model, most car companies are betting on high-voltage fast charging.

;

;The 800V high-voltage fast charging platform is currently regarded as the most likely technology path. In 2019, Porsche launched the Taycan, the world's first 800V high-voltage platform model. Automobile manufacturers such as BYD, Xpeng, Great Wall, Geely Jikrypton, etc. have all begun relevant layouts.

;

;“In the long term, 800V will be an opportunity to reshape the battery industry,” Li Bin said at the 2023 Shanghai Auto Show. “But no company has yet been able to reduce the cost of 800V to close to that of the current 400V. or a slightly higher level.”

;

;Li Yanwei also believes that high-voltage charging costs are high and is currently mainly used in relatively high-end models. It is unlikely that the technology will be transferred to low-end models in the short term. In addition, the layout of high-voltage charging piles is still imperfect, and an absolute advantage over the battery swap model has not yet been established in the short term.

;

;It is worth noting that Liu Jinliang, CEO of Yiyi Internet Technology Co., Ltd., signed the power exchange cooperation with NIO on behalf of Geely Yifang this time. He has led Geely's travel business in recent years, and has been responsible for Caocao Private Car, Yao Travel and other sectors.

;

;Li Yanwei said that online car-hailing may be the first area of ​​cooperation between the two parties. Due to cost control, operating vehicles such as taxis and online ride-hailing vehicles mostly use lithium iron phosphate batteries. The batteries are used frequently, so the demand for battery replacement will be higher.

; Fri, 01 Dec 2023 20:25:05 +0800 数据安全榜：谁在尽心倾力守护您的金融隐私？http://www.infzm.com/contents/261700

;

;In today’s digital age, financial privacy security is greatly testing everyone’s A financial institution also affects everyone's most sensitive nerves.

;

;But accidental events often produce extraordinary panic and associations. In November 2023, some financial institutions experienced successive risk incidents at home and abroad, and even encountered hackers, and their core data was leaked or hijacked. The incident triggered deep thinking in the financial and technological circles: How can we do our best to protect users’ financial privacy?

;

;In fact, regulators attach great importance to the security of national financial data and personal financial information, and have successively introduced a series of regulatory specifications aimed at establishing a system that covers all financial data. Life cycle safety management system mechanism. Among them, the protection of personal financial information has become an important part of the security management of financial data life cycle.

;

;In order to objectively evaluate the data security strength of the banking and life insurance industries, Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center conducted a survey on 20 systemically important commercial banks and 9 mainstream life insurance companies. Conduct systematic evaluation. Consistent with the construction logic of the indicator evaluation system of the wealth management list, green finance list, and digital finance list, the quantitative and qualitative indicators of the data security list account for 70% of the weight, and external expert review and media factors each account for 15% of the weight. In view of the differences in relevant information disclosure rules and actual disclosure situations between banks and insurance companies, Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center has constructed quantitative and qualitative indicator systems for data security in the banking and life insurance industries based on the key disclosure points of each bank and insurance company.

;

;Based on the strict data security standards of each bank and insurance institution under evaluation, and the rare data security accidents so far, this list focuses on the above-mentioned bancassurance institutions’ The strategic importance of data security, the transparency of information disclosure and the effectiveness of data security work.

;

;Bank ranking indicator system: the most important performance in four dimensions

;

;Banking industry data security ranking The quantitative and qualitative indicators of the evaluation indicator system are divided into four dimensions: organizational construction, institutional processes, technical tools and effectiveness, and include five secondary indicators.

;

;;

;

;Data Security Ranking Bank Ranking Index System ( Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/picture)

;

;The quantitative and qualitative indicators of the banking industry data security ranking indicator system are explained as follows:

;

;;Organizational construction; refers to the organizational structure of commercial banks in terms of data security. The research team of Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center considered the number of relevant responsible departments disclosed by commercial banks. The weight of this indicator accounts for 10%, reflecting the importance commercial banks attach to data security and information protection.

;

;;System process; refers to the degree of standardization of the process of building a data security system for commercial banks. Standardized institutional processes are an important cornerstone and guarantee for commercial banks to build data security systems. Under this dimension, we mainly examine the number of relevant systems and normative documents on data security of commercial banks, divided into two secondary indicators: the number of its own relevant systems and the number of normative documents related to supplier management, with a total weight of 20%.

;

;Among them, supplier management refers to when a commercial bank collects, transmits, stores, filters, analyzes, exchanges, and shares all data belonging to the bank. , a management mechanism for effective risk identification, assessment and effective control of relevant external partners. At present, most commercial banks do not pay enough attention to data security when conducting annual reviews of various suppliers. For suppliers who have access to sensitive bank data, once the supplier has security vulnerabilities or misbehaves, it is likely that the information security and data security of commercial banks will be threatened.

;

;In order to encourage commercial banks to pay more attention to the management of suppliers in terms of data security, the Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center has disclosed the relevant supplier management systems disclosed by commercial banks. The number of documents is included in the indicator system, accounting for 10% of the weight.

;

;;Technical tools; are a core part of the network security system. This indicator directly reflects the commercial bank's ability to protect data and privacy and the effectiveness and reliability of data security protection. In view of the fact that the research and evaluation of relevant technical tools in the data industry has been very systematic, we use the number of certification systems disclosed by each commercial bank to determine the bank's technical strength in data security. The weight of this indicator is 10%.

;

;;Performance indicators; account for 30% of the weight, which is the largest single indicator dimension and the only qualitative indicator to fully reflect the Results-oriented data security ranking evaluation logic. This indicator has a significant impact on the data security evaluation results of commercial banks. For commercial banks that have information security incidents, customer personal information leaks, major IT system failures and other incidents in 2023, we will warn the relevant commercial banks by reducing their scores.

;

;It needs to be emphasized that in order to encourage commercial banks to increase the transparency of information disclosure in the field of data security and reduce information asymmetry, we have not disclosed relevant information for some banks. In the case of indicator data, the relevant indicator will be given the lowest score.

;

;;Bank;;Data Security;;List;;:; ;Big banks dominate the top three;

;

;The bank data security list shows that Agricultural Bank of China ranks first, followed by Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and Bank of China. . The comprehensive scores of the three major banks all exceed 70 points, showing significant advantages.

;

;Agricultural Bank of China has obtained 51 various certifications related to data security, far more than any other bank. The bank was the first among major state-owned banks to issue the "Data Security Management Measures (Trial)" and established a comprehensive data security management system based on this. At the same time, the bank adheres to the "minimum necessary" principle, conducts mining and applications within the scope and authority of reasonable use of data, and encrypts sensitive customer information to maximize data security and privacy and avoid leakage and abuse.

;

;;

;

;Data Security Ranking Bank Ranking (Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/ Picture)

;

;Among joint-stock banks, Ping An Bank and China Merchants Bank ranked fourth and fifth respectively on the list, performing relatively well. Ping An Bank insists on using safe and available tools and technologies for data integration, including using security umbrella technology to automatically desensitize data and automatically protect sensitive groups, and ensure the independence and security of analysis scenarios through data safe houses. The bank's credit cards use a self-developed privacy computing platform to accurately identify external and debit card customers, effectively reducing customer acquisition costs.

;

;;Life insurance ranking indicator system:;;Three dimensions;; 7;< strong>;Sub-indicators;

;

;Life insurance is a typical data-intensive industry, with a large amount of personal information, market information and transaction information. Regulators attach great importance to data security in the life insurance industry. Since 2023, regulatory agencies have issued regulatory documents such as the "Measures for the Administration of Consumer Rights Protection in Banking and Insurance Institutions" and the "Notice on Strengthening Network and Data Security Management in Third-Party Cooperation", requiring life insurance institutions to establish a consumer personal information protection mechanism. And carry out self-examination and rectification of data risks.

;

;How is the performance of life insurance institutions? Based on public information such as financial reports, ESG or CSR reports, official announcements, and public reports disclosed by the nine life insurance companies, Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center conducted a quantitative analysis of the nine life insurance companies from the three dimensions of data security, internal governance, and external review. and qualitative evaluation, and set up 7 sub-indicators, each with a weight of 10%, and the total weight of quantitative and qualitative indicators is 70%.

;

;On this basis, Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center integrated expert review scores and media factors (each accounting for 15% weight) to build a life insurance data security ranking indicator system .

;

;;

;

;Data Security Ranking Life Insurance Ranking Index System ( Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/Picture)

;

;The quantitative and qualitative indicators of the life insurance data security ranking indicator system are explained as follows:

;

;In the data security dimension, the emphasis on data security work of life insurance institutions is measured by the number of times "data security" or "data privacy" is mentioned in ESG reports, and the effectiveness of data security work of life insurance institutions is measured by whether major information security incidents occurred in the past year. . The judgment of this indicator is based on the description of major information security events in the annual report or ESG report. The total weight of the above two indicators accounts for 20%.

;

;In the internal governance dimension, life insurance institutions are qualitatively evaluated based on three indicators: whether to set up an independent data security department, whether to formulate a data security protection system, and whether to conduct an annual information security review. Implementation of internal data security work. The total weight of the above three indicators accounts for 30%.

;

;The external review dimension qualitatively evaluates the acceptance of life insurance institutions in the professional field of data security based on two indicators: whether the App has violated user privacy issues and whether it has obtained ISO/IEC27001 certification. Level of recognition. The total weight of the above two indicators accounts for 20%.

;

;;Life;;Insurance ranking: China Life wins the championship, ;;AIA Taikang ranks among the top three;

;

;The life insurance data security list shows that China Life leads AIA Life to take the first place with an advantage of 1.59 points, and AIA Life ranks second. The comprehensive scores of both life insurance companies exceeded 80 points, 8 points ahead of the third place Taikang Life.

;

;;

;

;Data Security List Life Insurance List (Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/ Picture)

;

;Looking at the scores of quantitative and qualitative indicators, China Life, China Pacific Insurance, AIA Life and Taikang Life all scored over 60. This shows that they perform better overall in multiple dimensions such as data security, internal governance and external review. In the end, China Life won the championship due to its high scores in both external judges' scores and media factor scores.

;

;China Life proposed a comprehensive "Technology China Life" strategy as early as 2012, and has continued to increase investment in data security for 11 years. As one of the first batch of pilot financial institutions, China Life took the lead in the industry to migrate and put into production the Xinchuang database of key business systems, achieve 100% distributed architecture transformation of key business systems, and successfully build a new self-controlled distributed cloud architecture digital base. The company also proposed and built the first data center in the domestic life insurance industry and a high-standard underground computer room that obtained T4 certification. In addition, the company has also successfully developed a safe, green and elastic China Life Hybrid Cloud using internal private cloud and external public cloud resources, which integrates computing, storage and containers to significantly improve data security and computing capabilities.

;

;Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center also found that although the life insurance institutions at the bottom have not yet experienced major information security incidents, they have shortcomings in internal governance and external review obvious. For example, 4 institutions under evaluation did not set up independent data security departments, 2 institutions did not conduct annual information security audits, and the apps of 3 institutions were accused of infringing on user privacy, etc.

;

;Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center believes that life insurance institutions at the bottom of the list urgently need to pay more attention to the construction and improvement of data security systems, and at the same time adopt more stringent and transparent policies. In the face of public concerns, the public's information disclosure standards should be strengthened through practical and effective measures to enhance public trust in the data security of life insurance institutions.

;

;基辛格;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;当地时间2023年11月29日，美国前国家安全事务助理、国务卿，深刻影响了20世纪美国对外政策以及地缘政治发展的著名外交家、政治家、学者，亨利·基辛格逝世，享年100岁。

;

;;

;

;基辛格与弟弟沃尔特;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;1923年，海因茨·阿尔弗雷德·基辛格（Heinz Alfred Kissinger）出生在德国巴伐利亚省菲尔特（Fürth）的一个德裔犹太人家庭，父亲是教师，母亲是家庭主妇。 A year later, a younger brother was added to the family, Walter.

;

;儿时的基辛格热衷于踢足球，一度加入了菲尔特足球俱乐部的青训。 But with Hitler coming to power in 1933, the Nazi regime's oppression of the Jewish community intensified. Because he broke into the stadium to watch games in violation of Jewish segregation regulations, Kissinger was often scolded and beaten by guards, and he was also kicked out of the team. Later, Kissinger's father was also dismissed from his teaching position without reason.

;

;在一切变得更糟糕前，基辛格一家于1938年移民美国，此后他改名为亨利·基辛格。

;

;;

;

;1971年2月10日，美国总统理查德·尼克松（左）和国家安全顾问基辛格在白宫的办公室交谈;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;1969年，尼克松任命基辛格为国家安全事务助理。

;

;从政前，基辛格已是颇有名气的国际政治学者，并曾在多个有美国政府背景的机构或智库任职，三次担任纳尔逊·洛克菲勒（Nelson Rockefeller）竞选总统时的外交政策顾问，期间曾尖锐批评尼克松是“最危险的总统竞选者”。

;

;但在尼克松成为总统后，二人却戏剧性地成为了一对默契十足的搭档。 Faced with the turbulent global situation in the 1960s, Nixon gave Kissinger great room for action.

;

;1971年7月，基辛格在访问巴基斯坦期间秘密飞往北京，并促成了尼克松在1972年震惊世界的访华。

;

;;

;

;1972年2月25日，北京，美国总统尼克松和夫人出席晚宴并合影留念，前排右一为基辛格;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;;

;

;1974年7月3日，莫斯科克里姆林宫，在为期七天的首脑会议期间，美国总统尼克松（中）、国务卿基辛格（左）与苏联领导人勃列日涅夫（右）敬酒;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;1972年2月21日，美国总统尼克松抵达北京，开始访华行程。 2月28日，《中美联合公报》发布，宣布中美两国关系走向正常化。后来的研究普遍认为，中美关系的正常化极大影响了苏联的外交策略考量。

;

;在基辛格推动下，尼克松访华后不久，就于当年5月访问莫斯科，与苏联领导人勃列日涅夫会面，促成了《苏美联合公报》、《苏美相互关系原则》等9个文件的发布。此后几年里，美苏领导人来往频繁，在进攻性战略武器使用、核武器试验等领域取得了积极的共识。

;

;中美、美苏关系的改善直接带动了全球整体局势走向积极，基辛格关于大国平衡均势实现本国利益与国际和平的外交思想，在这一过程中得到了充分体现.

;

;;

;

;1973年1月23日，法国巴黎，越南民主共和国代表团特别顾问黎德寿（前排右二）和美国国家安全顾问基辛格（后排左二）在《巴黎和平协约》上签字;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;基辛格于1965至1966年曾两次前往越南.走访期间，他意识到美国“既不知道如何赢得战争，也不知道如何结束战争”。而最终这场将美国拖入泥沼的战争，也正是在他手里结束的。尼克松上台后，基辛格和南北越领导人开展过一系列艰难的谈判。

;

;中美关系的正常化极大推动了中南半岛局势的缓和。 1972年10月，基辛格与越共领导人黎德寿在巴黎举行的秘密谈判上取得了决定性突破，基辛格宣布“和平近在咫尺”，正在进行总统大选的尼克松民望大涨，最后以49 州的压倒性优势当选连任。

;

;1973年1月，各方签署《巴黎和平协约》。南北越停火，美国撤出在越南的所有部队，北越释放所有美国战俘。 Kissinger and Le Duc Tho were also awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. Le Duc Tho refused to accept the award, and Kissinger announced that he would donate the prize money to the children of American servicemen killed or missing in the Vietnam War.

;

;;

;

;1975年9月1日，基辛格在耶路撒冷的酒店眺望风景;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;;

;

;1975年9月6日，在埃及和以色列之间的往返航班上，基辛格正在阅读报纸，妻子南希拍了拍他的头;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;1973年“赎罪日战争”（即第四次中东战争）爆发，基辛格再次奔走在调停的First line.出于美国政治利益和他本人的血统，他曾试图拖延停火，让以色列军队获得更多的时间扩大战果。

;

;战后，基辛格却一度试图推迟美国对以色列进行的军火物资补偿，并致力于推动联合国安理会第242号决议实现和平。以沙特阿拉伯为首的中东产油国对美国实行石油禁运后，基辛格下场多方斡旋。

;

;从1973到1975年，基辛格来往于埃及、沙特阿拉伯、叙利亚和以色列的各路领导人之间，开展“穿梭外交”，成功取得了包括埃及总统萨达特等人的信任，以承诺出售武器换取沙特阿拉伯解除石油禁运，促成关于西奈半岛问题的两项协议——以色列将从西奈部分领土上撤走并放弃了结束战争状态的要求，埃及则同意对以色列的非军事物资开放苏伊士运河，这被认为是美国在福特政府时期取得的为数不多的外交成就之一。

;

;;

;

;1995年12月11日，左起：基辛格、戴安娜王妃、科林·鲍威尔与新闻主播芭芭拉·沃尔特斯出席第41届世界脑瘫联合协会颁奖晚会。戴安娜王妃在晚会上荣获UCP人道主义奖;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;基辛格在尼克松因水门事件丑闻被迫辞职后，继续在福特总统政府担任国家安全事务助理和国务卿。但促成西奈半岛协议达成后没多久，在1975年11月被称为“万圣节大屠杀”的内阁改组中，基辛格的国家安全事务助理职务就被布伦特·斯科克罗夫特所取代.福特于1976年的总统大选落败后，基辛格辞去了国务卿的职务。

;

;此后基辛格游走于政商学三界：成立了中国风险投资公司，担任董事长和首席执行官；担任过;费利浦·麦克莫兰;（Freeport-McMoRan）的董事会成员；做过美国恐怖袭击国家委员会主席……此外还包括校长、各种机构的政治顾问或董事会成员，有些职位甚至还颇具争议。

;

;与此同时他还发行了至少7本书，内容包括自己的回忆录、政治评论，甚至还有一本关于人工智能的观察。

;

;;

;

;2000年7月12日，美国得克萨斯州州长、共和党总统候选人小布什（左）和美国前国务卿基辛格在奥斯汀州长官邸的门廊上向记者挥手致意;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;;

;

;2017年5月10日，美国总统特朗普（右）在白宫与美国前国务卿基辛格会面;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;作为美国历史上有过杰出贡献、经验丰富且在政商界拥有广泛人脉的老牌政治家，基辛格基本成了尼克松以来每一任美国总统都曾请教或拜会过的“山头”。

;

;2016年11月17日，基辛格与当选总统唐纳德·特朗普会面，他们对全球事务进行了一番讨论，次年他们又见过一次。

;

;后来在2017年8月17日的一次采访中，基辛格谈到那位全世界都琢磨不透、时常剑走偏锋的总统时无奈地说：“我希望（特朗普）有一个奥古斯丁的时刻。对于圣奥古斯丁来说……他早年行径跟后来完全不同，但他有一天忽然受到神启，成为了后来的那个圣人。人们当然不指望总统能成为那样，但总是可以想想的。”

;

;;

;

;1985年，基辛格参观广州清平街市场;（安哥/图）;

;

;;

;

;2005年5月12日，河南许昌，美国前国务卿基辛格来到邓庄乡许庄村七组村民梁书华家，感受当地农户的家庭生活;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;;

;

;2023年10月24日，美国前国务卿基辛格在纽约举行的美中关系全国委员会年度颁奖晚宴上讲话;（新华社/图）;

;

;直至走上政坛前，基辛格都未曾表现出对中国的太多兴趣，但因为工作而对中国进行深入了解后，他开始对中国有了一个全新的认识。

;

;决定推进中美关系发展后，基辛格认真学习了中国文化、历史和政治等国情，并密切关注中国的政治经济发展。从1971到2023年，基辛格先后访华一百多次，这个记录在西方政治家中绝无仅有。他曾表示，“中国是我交往最久、最为深入的国家。中国已经成为我生命中非常重要的一部分。”

;

;基辛格逝世后，中国外交部发言人汪文斌表示，基辛格博士是中国人民的老朋友、好朋友，是中美关系的开拓者和建设者。 "He has long been concerned about and supported the development of Sino-US relations, and has visited China more than a hundred times, making historic contributions to promoting the normalization of Sino-US relations. The Chinese people will remember Dr. Kissinger's sincere feelings and important contributions to Sino-US relations.贡献。”

;一款名为“大富翁电玩捕鱼”的游戏被广西苍梧公安认定为赌博。 （人民视觉供图）

;

;“大富翁电玩捕鱼”是一款游戏，由北京一家游戏公司开发、运营。两年多时间内，玩家充值总额约1.57亿元。

;

;但在广西苍梧县的公安机关看来，这个“捕鱼”不是游戏，而是赌博。

;

;2022年2月18日，该游戏公司实控人宗超、钟柳青以及7名员工因涉嫌开设赌场罪被苍梧县公安局逮捕。 2023年10月23日，苍梧县法院一审判决，宗超被判有期徒刑6年10个月，钟柳青被判有期徒刑5年半，其余7人获刑2年到2年11个月不等.

;

;判决书中说明，苍梧县公安局根据在工作中发现的线索，经初查确认涉案游戏部分玩家属苍梧县籍，报案人和3名证人也是苍梧籍，他们的证言证实涉案游戏涉嫌赌博，苍梧县属犯罪地，具有管辖权。

;

;南方周末记者从参加庭审人士处获悉，巧合的是，其中有两名证人与被告人关押在同一监室。一审庭审期间，被告人提交的情况说明显示，两名证人均表示自己在公安机关工作人员安排下完成笔录，做笔录前，自己并未接触过这款游戏。

;

;不过，这两名证人随后在接受看守所询问时，又推翻了在情况说明中的说法。

;

;宗超、钟柳青不服判决，已向梧州市中级法院提交上诉状。

;

;灰色地带和侥幸心理

;

;涉案人员宗超、钟柳青和游戏公司的初创员工之前都是一家互联网大厂的同事。 2018年，他们从原单位离职，成立北京四海互娱科技有限公司，合伙运营捕鱼游戏。 2019年下半年，游戏上线运营。

;

;捕鱼游戏的玩法是，用户充值人民币获得游戏金币后，消耗金币开炮捕鱼，打鱼成功后按倍率赢取金币。同时，用户在“福豆场”模式中，捕鱼时可以获得“福豆”，“福豆”能用来兑换话费、实物、京东购物卡等。

;

;一审判决书中引用了一名被告人的供述。他同宗超、钟柳青等人以及律师有一个线上群，专门讨论过这款游戏是否会触碰法律红线。律师给出的意见是，这款游戏玩法处于灰色地带，没有法律说可以这样干，也没有说不能这样干，所以当时就抱着侥幸心理。

;

;在被告人和他们的律师看来，这款游戏不能被认为是赌博的理由是，通过捕鱼赢得的金币虽与“爆率”“倍率”成比例关系，但是金币不能用来兑换人民币。而能兑换成人民币的福豆有其生成机制，同“爆率”“博大小”“倍率”无关。

;

;;此案在;2023年3月28日、6月25日至6月29日公开开庭审理。宗超的辩护律师为其做无罪辩护。律师在庭上指出，赌博的本质在于实现“以小博大”。游戏运营者为确保运营游戏不落入开设赌场罪的范畴，游戏附赠的福豆，有充值金额比例上的限制，且运营者通过设置黑名单的方式，将试图“以小博大”的玩家拦截在游戏之外。因此，这款游戏不能实现“以小博大”，故不是赌博。

;

;而法院一审判决认定，玩家在捕鱼时使用消耗金币越多、倍数越大的大炮打鱼，能量条就会增长越快，对应就能产生不同等级的福豆，故存在“以小博大”。具有提现功能，属赌博游戏，予以认定。

;

; “一时疏忽”？多个时间点出现矛盾

;

;2022年1月2日15点50分，当地人潘建峰到苍梧县石桥镇派出所报案称自己在家下载了“大富翁电玩捕鱼”App。实名注册后，发现这款游戏可以线上充值，之后通过玩游戏赢取“福豆”，“福豆”可以兑换成人民币提现。他告诉民警，自己已经充值36元，提现2元，因此认为这是款赌博游戏。

;

;根据一审判决，在潘建峰报案前13天，2021年12月20日，苍梧县公安局已经注意到这款App，并进行初查，经核查发现有苍梧籍会员41人。

;

;苍梧县公安局于潘建峰报案当日对此立案侦查。

;

;此案在2023年3月28日、6月25日至6月29日公开开庭审理。庭审时，多名被告人的辩护律师提出了对潘建峰注册游戏、提现、报案时间过于接近的疑问。

;

;游戏后台数据显示，潘建峰在报案当天15时15分56秒注册游戏。他提供的提现界面截图则显示，他在15时49分17秒提现。也就是说，他在接受询问前25分钟刚注册游戏，且提现时距接受询问仅相差43秒。

;

;除潘建峰外，被告人的辩护律师认为证人王凯、覃军、陈涛从游戏中提现和接受警方询问的时间存在矛盾。

;

;王凯、覃军、陈涛分别从2022年1月7日10时25分、2022年1月7日12时10分、2022年1月10日10点30分开始在石桥派出所接受询问。

;

;王凯在接受询问时说，自己在游戏中已充值54元，提现2元；覃军说自己充了36元，提现2元；陈涛也称自己充值36元，提现2 yuan.三人均在询问中表示可以提供提现页面截图。

;

;庭审中，律师指出，三人提供的截图中，王凯、覃军提现时间都是1月8日21时31分，陈涛则在1月10日13时27分提现.也就是说，他们的提现时间均晚于接受询问的时间。

;

;对于律师提出的上述时间问题，公诉人出具了一份苍梧县公安局的情况说明。

;

;这份文件解释，潘建峰在家先玩游戏，1月2日15时左右到石桥派出所报案，现场操作演示后提现，派出所受案接报时间15时50分。被告人辩护律师又指出时间线上的问题：潘建峰在下午3点左右抵达派出所，那么游戏应当是在派出所内注册的。庭审时，控辩双方对这一问题展开辩论。

;

;情况说明中还指出，办案人员制作王凯、覃军的询问笔录时，使用了1月7日的笔录版本，忘记修改询问时间，实际时间是1月9日；制作陈涛笔录时，也“一时疏忽，粗心大意”，把询问时间写错，准确时间是1月10日14时30分至15时40分，按照这一解释，陈涛在接受询问前1小时完成提现.

;

;证人说法反转

;

;巧合的是，证人覃军、陈涛后来因涉嫌寻衅滋事也被羁押在苍梧县看守所，分别同被告人宗超、钟柳青关押在一个监室。

;

;两名证人都曾表示在公安机关工作人员安排下完成笔录，甚至连笔录内容都没有看过就签了字。

;

;庭审时，宗超提交了一份覃军手写的情况说明，描述了报案经过：2021年年底，同镇好友王凯打电话给他，让他带人去石桥派出所配合玩个捕鱼游戏。他带着潘建峰去了派出所。王凯微信给他们分享游戏下载链接，之后他们注册、充值并提现，再将相关游戏截图发给民警，全部完成后签字离开。他称，事前自己并没有接触过这款游戏。

;

;陈涛则同钟柳青等3名被告人羁押在同一监室。

;

;庭审时，3名被告人都提交了自己手写的说明。一名被告人称，第一次开庭前四天，他在监室内收到传票，陈涛注意到上面写着游戏公司的名字，说了句“我好像举报过”。该被告人就问陈涛为什么举报，陈涛的回答是“没玩过，就是被叫到派出所签笔录”,并表示没看过笔录内容。

;

;不过，二人的说法又都在看守所给他们做的谈话记录中发生反转。

;

;在2023年5月15日的记录中，陈涛表示，3月底开庭结束后，钟柳青找过他，让他写书面证明或出庭作证，证明他去公安机关反映网络赌博的情况是假的，不是主动反映事实。他没有答应，因为他之前说的都是事实。之后钟柳青写了书面材料叫他签字，提出只要其答应出庭作证，推翻他之前在公安机关的笔录，可以给他5万元、10万元甚至50万元，他都没有答应。

;

;覃军则在3天后的谈话中表示，自己的情况说明是“糊里糊涂写的”，“他们说话好有艺术、好有文化，我也不知道怎么的就被洗脑了”。

;

;苍梧县法院一审判决认为，潘建峰、覃军、王凯、陈涛4人的证言客观真实，与案件具有关联性，予以认定。而被告人提供的上述情况说明等材料，与案件查明的事实不符，不予采信。

;

;;（文中潘建峰、陈涛、覃军、王凯均为化名）;
